entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight then 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 3 April 2023
